item.title: Delete Node in a Linked List
item.description: Write a function to delete a node (except the tail) in a singly linked list, given only access to that node. Supposed the linked list is 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 and you are given the third node with value 3, the linked list should become 1 -> 2 -> 4 after calling your function. Solution: # Definition for singly-linked list. # class ListNode(object): # def __init__(self, x): # self.
